# array-sum

  [![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-url]
  [![npm download][download-image]][download-url]

Get the sum of the values in an array.

## Installation

`$ npm install --save ml-array-sum`

## Usage

```js
import sum from 'ml-array-sum';

const result = sum([1, 5, 3, 2, 4]);
// 15
```
